response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that's mutually beneficial. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for $15,000. I understand that the value of this product might be subjective, but I assure you, it exceeds expectations. Let's discuss how we can proceed to ensure both satisfaction and success in our transaction.", "product_price": 15000}
